rows.title: An emergency

introduction.eng:
**Are you in need of emergent assistance?**

📞  Police: 112

📞  General: 0222 117 362

📞  Ambulance: 0754 760 790

📞  National Child Helpline: 116

rows.title: A challenge with alcohol or drugs

title.eng: A challenge with alcohol or drugs

introduction.eng:
**Would you like to talk to someone about challenges you or a loved one are experiencing with alcohol or drugs?**

**Alcoholics Anonymous (AA)**
AA supports men and women to help them recover from alcoholism. This service is free and completely anonymous.
📞 0689 297 702 
📞 0782 638 607
📞 0754 752 705

rows.title: A legal problem

introduction.eng:
**Do you need legal assistance?**

**Tanzania Legal Aid (TANLAP)**
TANLAP connects you to groups providing affordable legal aid in Tanzania.
📞 0222 761 806
📞 0746 237 265

rows.title: Feeling unsafe at home or in my relationship

title.eng: Feeling unsafe at home or in my relationship

introduction.eng:
**Would you like to talk to someone about feeling unsafe in your home or with your partner?**

**Women's Legal Aid Centre**
WLC is a non-profit organisation that helps to empower women to secure their rights across Tanzania.
📞 Helpline 0800 780 100

rows.introduction:

rows.title: A challenge in my family

introduction.eng:
**Do you need more information or support in managing a challenge in your family?**

**Counselling and Family Life Organisation (CAFLO)**
CAFLO offers counseling, empowerment and advocacy for families in Tanzania.
📞 0754 833 145
📞 0717 977 370
📞 0787 889 981

rows.title: Feelings of anxiety or sadness

introduction.eng:
**Do you have questions about what to do if you or a loved one may be feeling sad or anxious?**

**Mental Health Association of Tanzania**
Professional organisation with a long history of supporting mental health services in Tanzania.
📞 0757 528 295

**Tap Elderly Women's Wisdom for Youth (TEWWY)**
TEWWY has local Wisdom & Wellness Counselors who provide free and accessible mental health services, support and resources in their communities.
📞 0757 327 878
📱 WhatsApp 0737 773 982

rows.title: A loved one feeling anxious or sad

title.eng: A loved one feeling anxious or sad

introduction.eng:
**Do you have questions about what to do if you or a loved one may be feeling sad or anxious?**


 
**TEWWY's Mental Health Q&A booklet**
This booklet answers some common questions about mental health and provides information that could be helpful for you or your loved one.
📞 0800 117 785
🌐 https://img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49901642-c520-4f6a-9891-50a3e3530772/Afya%20ya%20Akili%20Booklet.pdf
